With the help of this plant marker, I can tell the Forestmaster where to replant trees.
This block works like soil, where the sapling can be planted. I can use a sapling to select the tree type which will grow on the plant marker.
The green point indicates if the type is set, and I can place a sapling of the same type with my hand after that.
The Forestmaster will then plant at each plant marker in range the fitting sapling, if that sapling is available in the drone station.
